ygData.subject: Re: Has anyone dueled a magician?
ygData.msgSnippet: I dueled my brother s druid the other day in the Arena and I had no problem getting fear to stick on him even though I had him targeted. ... From: Mike
ygData.messageBody:
I dueled my brother's druid the other day in the Arena and I had no problem
getting fear to stick on him even though I had him targeted.


----- Original Message -----
From: Mike McGovern <mcgov@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, January 05, 2000 3:16 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Has anyone dueled a magician?


> "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" wrote:
>
> > on another note, someone earlier mentioned possibly using CoD and DDD
> > instead of fast weapons, to avoid the damage shield. if these kill him,
> > since theyare a DoT, the mage will lose exp as well. however if you are
> > over level 26 feel free to just fear the pet away. that is what i did
when
> > i dueled a level 46 magician. bad thing is, you can not cast fear
anymore
> > with a PC targetted. found that out (even though i know it was on the
list,
> > i just forgot) when dueling a paladin couple nights ago. my question
is,
> > since our fear is AE can you still fear a PC if you sing it near him and
> > just do not have him targetted?
>
> Actually, CoD and DDD are fine to use. Dots won't make you lose xp
anymore.
> (Both PC and NPC dots, from what I've seen.) However, if the dot kills
them, the
> duel will be "canceled by their untimely death".
>
> As to the fear question: You won't get an answer out of me on that one,
but...try it
> out.. :)
>
> -Lohengrin, 45th bard of Rallos Zek
>
> >
> > Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
> > Tyria Sarkin, L35 High Elf Wizard
> > <Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
> >
> > >
> > > From: John_Senior@...
> > >
> > > Just to let you all know, my RL best friend has a 36 Mage and
> > > I dueled him
> > > once for fun. You can imagine how pissed off I was when I
> > > lost exp after
> > > the fight. Why? You ask.
> > >
> > > Well, his pet killed me, causing me to die from a NPC, which
> > > also is the
> > > same as dieing via a normal mob. The duel was void and I lost
> > > 1/2 bub exp
> > > (this was back at level 29 or so, he was 31). So, I must stress, NEVER
> > > fight a mage in a duel because if you die you can kiss
> > > goodbye to your exp
> > > (if the pet gets the last hit and kills you).
> >
